pr_title: Add an option to define nodeId for sequence generator.

timeline.author: janinko
janinko

replies.bodyText: What the benefit of using the constant, it's used only here and it can be anything ?
replies.author: matejonnet

replies.bodyText:
readability - giving it a name may be less confusing ("Why is there zero? Why not one?")
negligible speed - making it Integer constant removes the autoboxing of int.

gcode with autoboxing:
       3: iconst_0
       4: invokestatic  #3                  // Method java/lang/Integer.valueOf:(I)Ljava/lang/Integer;

gcode with constant:
       3: getstatic     #3                  // Field KEY:Ljava/lang/Integer;
replies.author: janinko
